root.title: Ortaa-Tey (е-99)
root.place: The stone was found near Samagaltay (Tyva).
root.description: Some signs are put on ancient images.
root.size: Height - 74 cm, length - 80 cm, width - 12 cm.
root.investigation: Batmanov and Kunaa suggested photo and copies with some deviations 586.
